body_html:
So the whole cache invalidation system doesn't extend to external repository definitions?

If so, that's a darn shame. Cache invalidation is the No. 1 problem Bazel exists to solve. I hope the Bazel team will choose to prioritize solving it maximally. Even if it's one of the two hardest problems in computer science :)
